title: Wholemeal Fruit Cake Cookies
ingredients: ['220g dark brown soft sugar', '250ml water', '150g raisins', '30g butter', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '180g wholemeal flour', '3/4 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon ground ginger', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '75g dates, pitted and chopped', '120g cut mixed peel', '60g chopped nuts', '75g chopped dried mixed fruit']
